item.title: LULU
item.description: score:40 Chances: Lululemon Continues Its Quarterly Report Winning Streak and Shows It Is Worthy of Challenging Nike Lululemon Stock Pops On High Chinese Demand and Positive Earnings Report Lululemon says third quarter off to ‘solid start’ as N.America improves Risks: Lululemon Shares Just Can’t Stretch Very Far Anymore Lululemon Heads Toward Earnings In Weak Shape As IBD Sector Leaders Pull Back Retailers Raise Red Flags; Analysts Turn Cautious Amid Divergent Results Score:40 investment score = chances characters count - risks characters count
